name: Pete's Peril
description:
Pete's Peril is an adventure game that takes Pete in and out of different caves, mines, buildings and mountains to solve puzzles of all skill levels. Dodging boulders, grabbing diamonds, upgrading tools, clothing for different climates and crush enemies along the way is all part of his peril.



Collecting diamonds is how Pete can buy other tools, clothing and other items from multiple shops.



Pete can change clothing for different parts of the world. Everything from desert caves to extreme heat from lava flows, from deep sea diving suit to winter coat and boots.



Pete has to drop rocks, bombs or even valuables on enemies to avoid being injured by them. If Pete gets too hurt he goes to the hospital to rest up and regain some strength to carry on in his adventure. He can also buy food and medicines to regain heath.
